name: EPBPeakEnergyHourCheck
0:
”Alexa, ask e. p. b. if is it peak”
”Alexa, ask e. p. b. if it is off peak”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: e. p. b.
Developer Terms of Use
des: A skill that allows you to ask "Alexa, ask EPB if it is peak" to determine if you should wait to do your laundry or not! Additionally, you can ask how long until peak or off peak to see how long you need to wait!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
